title: Customized Educational Material Search and Utilization Strategies for Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Core social studies concepts and foundational online search skills
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education for job seekers, focusing on adapting and utilizing social sector materials contextually

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate reliable online resources for social studies topics with 80% accuracy.
Learners can use optimized keyword search techniques to locate job-related educational materials within 15 minutes.
Learners can systematize the process of modifying existing materials to align with current social issues in three stages (e.g., analysis-reconstruction-application).

resources: Ministry of Education Open Educational Content

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
